question: Assalamualaikum mufti saheb,Is kentucky fried chicken (KFC) is halal or not?Jazakallah khair.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
We are unable to comment on the Halaal status of KFC in UAE as we are from
South Africa.

However, hereunder is our reply to a similar query:
It is not permissible to eat from any non-Muslim food outlet if the outlet
is not managed by an honest Muslim who has the proper knowledge of the
concept of Halaal and Haraam and also runs the outlet accordingly.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
